articles.author: Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
articles.title: American contractor killed, troops wounded in Iran-linked drone attack in Syria, prompting US airstrikes - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Pentagon responded to an attack on a base in Syria by launching airstrikes on groups affiliated with Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps.
articles.content: An American contractor was killed and five U.S. troops and a second U.S. contractor were wounded when a suspected Iranian-linked drone attacked a coalition military base in northeast Syria late Thurs… [+2741 chars]

articles.title: Scientists use locks of music composer Beethoven's hair to find clues of his death | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management - indiablooms
